Carregando dados

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(readxl, tidyverse, writexl)

```




```{r}

producao_pse <- read_excel("promocao_de_saude/Data/producao_pse_2023.xlsx", skip = 8)
```
